Place the piece of apple next to the knife in the pan on the stove.
Take the pan that has the knife and piece of apple in it.
Turn left and walk straight to the counter.
Place the pan with the knife and piece of apple in it on the counter.
tasks.task_desc: Place a pan with a knife and piece of apple in it on the counter.

high_descs: Go right and cross the room to face the sink.
Pick the fork up from the left side of the sink.
Turn to the right and face the right side of the sink.
Put the fork in the sink and turn the water on and then off and pick the fork up again.
Turn and open the drawer to the left of the sink.
Put the fork in the drawer.
tasks.task_desc: Put a clean fork in a drawer.

high_descs: Move forward and when you get close to the fridge, turn right to continue across the room to the sink.
Pick up the fork from the drying rack on the left side of the sink.
Move a step to the right while carrying the fork.
Place the fork in the right side of the sink, turn on the water and then remove the fork.
Turn left to face the dishwasher while keeping the sink to your right.
Open the drawer just left of the sink and place the fork inside.
tasks.task_desc: Put a washed fork in a drawer.

high_descs: Turn right and walk to the sink.
Pick up the fork on the counter by the sink.
Take a step right.
Wash the fork in the sink.
Turn left.
Open the drawer all the way to the left, but on the same side of the counter as the sink and place the fork in it.
tasks.task_desc: Put a clean fork in drawer.

high_descs: Go to the stove on your left
Pick up the pan from the stove
Turn left and go to the cabinet at the end of the room
Put the pan on the cabinet top
Pick up the kitchen spoon from the cabinet top
Put the spoon on the pan
tasks.task_desc: To put a spoon in a pan on the cabinet top

high_descs: Turn and go to the stove.
Pick up a pot on the stove.
Turn and go to the counter by the coffee machine.
Put the pot on the counter.
Pick up a ladle on the counter.
Put the ladle in the pot on the counter.
tasks.task_desc: Move a pot from the stove to the counter by the coffee machine.

high_descs: Go to the stove on your left.
Pick up the pan on the front right of the stove.
Turn left, bring the pan to the counter.
Put the pan on the counter, in front of the kettle.
Pick up the spoon on the counter.
Stand the spoon in the pan on the counter.
tasks.task_desc: Stand a spoon in a pan on the counter.

high_descs: Turn right, walk across the room to the counter, and turn right.
Pick up the spatula next to the potatoes.
Turn right, take a few steps, turn left to face the sink.
Put the spatula in the sink, turn on the water, turn off the water, pick up the spatula.
Turn left to face the counter against the other wall.
Open the top drawer under the potato, put the spatula in the drawer, close the drawer.
tasks.task_desc: Put the clean spatula in the drawer.

high_descs: Walk across the kitchen to the counter past the sink.
Pick up the spatula on the counter.
Turn and take the spatula to the sink.
Rinse off the spatula in the sink.
Turn and face the counter with the potato on it.
Put the rinsed spatula in the drawer under the potato.
tasks.task_desc: Put a spatula in the drawer.

high_descs: Turn right and walk to the counter past the sink, then face the counter on your right.
Pick up the spatula on the counter top.
Walk to the sink on your right.
Put the spatula in the sink, run some water, and wash the spatula. Drain the sink.
Take the spatula out of the sink an turn to your left
Open the last drawer to the left of the sink and put the spatula in, then shut the drawer.
tasks.task_desc: Put a clean spatula in the drawer.

high_descs: Move to the sink to the left of you.
Pick up an apple from the sink.
Move to the bin behind you before the fridge on the right.
Place the apple inside of the bin.
Move to the microwave in front of you to the right slightly.
Retrieve the apple from the microwave and close the door.
Move to the bin to the left of you.
Place the apple inside of the bin.
tasks.task_desc: Throw the apple in the sink and microwave away in the bin.

high_descs: Turn to the left and walk towards the sink and face it
Pick up the green apple from the sink
Turn around and walk to the trash bin next to the refrigerator and face it on the right
Place the apple inside the trash bin
Turn to the right and face the microwave
Open up the microwave and take out the apple, then close the door back
Turn to the left and face the trash bin next to the refrigerator
Place the apple inside the trash bin
tasks.task_desc: Getting rid of green apples in the trash bin

high_descs: Turn to the left and walk straight towards the sink
Pick up the green apple from the sink
Turn around and walk straight then face the right at the trash bin
Place the green apple inside the trash bin
Turn to the right and walk straight then turn left and face the microwave
Open the microwave and remove the green apple then close the door
Turn to the left and walk straight then face the trash bin on the right
Place the green apple inside the trash bin
tasks.task_desc: Throw away green apples in the trash bin

high_descs: Turn left and go to the counter to the left of the sink.
Take the green apple behind the metal grater.
Turn around and take the apple to the trash can between the refrigerator and the counter.
Put the apple in the trash can.
Go right to the microwave above the middle of the counter.
Take the apple out of the microwave.
Take the apple to the trash can between the refrigerator and the counter.
Put the apple into the trash can.
tasks.task_desc: Throw out the apple on the counter and the apple in the microwave.

high_descs: Turn right to go to the near corner of the window on your left, then right again and go forward to the counter between the stove and the sink.
Pick up the ladle from the back of the counter near the stove.
Take the ladle to the sink to your left.
Wash the ladle in the sink.
Turn to your left and go forward until you reach the counter that was on your left.
Put the ladle away in the lower right cabinet that is in the corner to the right of the white dishwasher.
tasks.task_desc: Put a washed ladle away in a kitchen cabinet.

high_descs: Turn to your right walk straight then cross the room go to the left side of the stove
Pick up the ladle on the counter
Turn to your left move forward then turn right
Put the ladle in the sink and rinse it
Pick up the ladle then turn left then head to the second right cabinet beside the washer
Open the cabinet then put in the ladle then close the cabinet
tasks.task_desc: Put the clean ladle on the cabinet

high_descs: Cross the room and stand in front of the counter to the left of the stove.
Pick the big spoon up from the counter.
Move left and turn to face the sink.
Put the big spoon in the sink and turn the water on and then off and pick the spoon up again.
Turn to face to the left lower cabinets, to the right of the white appliance.
Open the cabinet door of the far right cabinet in the corner and put the spoon in and then shut the door.
tasks.task_desc: Put a clean spoon in a cabinet.

high_descs: Move towards the counter area between the sink and the range.
Open the cabinet door to the right of the sink, pick up the glass, then close the cabinet door.
Turn around and move towards the fridge then turn right and move to the dishwasher to the right of the silver trash bin.

Open the microwave above the dishwasher, place the glass on the right side of the blue plate, microwave the glass to warm it, then open the microwave door, pick up the glass, then close the microwave door.
Move to the sink to the right of the red coffee maker.
Place the glass in the sink, on top of the drain.
tasks.task_desc: Place a warmed glass in the sink.

high_descs: Turn right and walk across the room to face the counter to the right of the sink.
Pick up the cup in the cabinet under the ladle.
Turn to the left and walk forward to face the microwave above the stove.
Heat the cup in the microwave and remove it.
Turn to the right and walk over to face the sink.
Place the cup in the right side of the sink.
tasks.task_desc: To heat a cup and place it in the sink.

high_descs: Head to the cabinet under the sink.
Open up the left cabinet under the spoon on the counter and pick up the cup in there.
Turn around, bring the cup to the microwave on the right.
Heat the cup in the microwave.
Bring the heated cup to the sink on the left.
Put the heated cup in the sink.
tasks.task_desc: Put a heated cup in the sink.

high_descs: Turn left then head to the counter on your left
Pick up the ladle beside the coffee maker on the counter
Turn right then face the cabinet above the sink
Open the cabinet put the ladle on the pan
Pick up the pan with ladle
Turn left and face the counter
Put the pan with ladle on the counter
tasks.task_desc: Put the pan with ladle on the counter

high_descs: Turn around and head to the counter on the right side of the dishwasher.
Pick up the spoon from behind the apple off the top of the counter.
Turn to the right and go to the front of the sink.
Open the cabinet and place the spoon inside the pan.
Take the pan out and close the door.
Turn left and move back to the end of the counter.
Place the pan to the left of the soup spoon on the shelf above the counter.
tasks.task_desc: Put the spoon in the pan and place on the shelf above the counter.

high_descs: Turn around and go to the end of the counter, make a right and go to the stove, then turn left and go to the counter across from you.
Pick up the ladle on the counter top.
Turn to the cabinets above the sink, on your right.
Place the ladle in the pan, that is in the top cabinet.
Pick up the pan with the ladle inside it.
Turn to your left and go back to the counter top the ladle was on.
Place the pan with the ladle inside it on the back, raised counter top, to the left of the spoon.
tasks.task_desc: Put a pan containing a ladle on the counter top.
